items.label: Move order to dead letter queue

api/catalog.title: API Catalog
api/catalog.description: The WMS Platform exposes APIs through two primary mechanisms: REST APIs (OpenAPI) for synchronous operations and Event APIs (AsyncAPI) for asynchronous, event-driven communication.

api/events-api.title: Events API (AsyncAPI)
api/events-api.description: This document describes the event-driven API using CloudEvents specification.

api/order-service/create-a-new-order.title: Create a new order
api/order-service/create-a-new-order.description: Creates a new order in the system and triggers the order fulfillment workflow

api/order-service/get-dlq-statistics.title: Get DLQ statistics
api/order-service/get-dlq-statistics.description: Retrieve statistics about dead letter queue entries

api/order-service/get-orders-eligible-fo.title: Get orders eligible for retry
api/order-service/get-orders-eligible-fo.description: Retrieve orders that are eligible for reprocessing based on retry count and status

api/order-service/list-dead-letter-queue.title: List dead letter queue entries
api/order-service/list-dead-letter-queue.description: Retrieve failed orders from the dead letter queue with optional filtering

api/order-service/list-orders.title: List orders
api/order-service/list-orders.description: Retrieve a paginated list of orders with optional filtering

api/order-service/move-order-to-dead-let.title: Move order to dead letter queue
api/order-service/move-order-to-dead-let.description: Move a failed order to the dead letter queue after max retries exceeded

api/order-service/order-service-api.title: Order Service API
api/order-service/order-service-api.description: Comprehensive REST API for order management operations in the WMS platform.

api/order-service/reset-order-for-retry.title: Reset order for retry
api/order-service/reset-order-for-retry.description: Reset order status to allow reprocessing from the beginning

api/order-service/resolve-dlq-entry.title: Resolve DLQ entry
api/order-service/resolve-dlq-entry.description: Mark a dead letter queue entry as resolved with resolution details

api/rest-api.title: REST API Reference
api/rest-api.description: This document provides an overview of the REST APIs exposed by WMS Platform services.

api/specs/asyncapi/index.title: AsyncAPI Specifications
api/specs/asyncapi/index.description: All WMS Platform event APIs are documented using AsyncAPI 3.0.0. Events follow the CloudEvents 1.0 specification and are published to Apache Kafka.

api/specs/openapi/index.title: OpenAPI Specifications
api/specs/openapi/index.description: All WMS Platform REST APIs are documented using OpenAPI 3.0.3. Each service exposes a RESTful API with consistent conventions.

architecture/c4-diagrams/code.title: C4 Level 4: Code Diagrams
architecture/c4-diagrams/code.description: Code diagrams show the internal structure of components at the class/struct level, focusing on key domain aggregates and their relationships.

architecture/c4-diagrams/components.title: C4 Level 3: Component Diagrams
architecture/c4-diagrams/components.description: Component diagrams show the internal structure of each container, revealing the major building blocks and their interactions.

architecture/c4-diagrams/containers.title: C4 Level 2: Container Diagram
architecture/c4-diagrams/containers.description: The Container diagram shows the high-level technology choices and how responsibilities are distributed across containers (applications, databases, etc.).

architecture/c4-diagrams/context.title: C4 Level 1: System Context
architecture/c4-diagrams/context.description: The System Context diagram shows the WMS Platform as a whole and its relationships with external actors and systems.

architecture/overview.title: Architecture Overview
architecture/overview.description: The WMS Platform follows a microservices architecture with event-driven communication and workflow orchestration. This document provides a high-level overview of the system design.

architecture/sequence-diagrams/order-can.title: Order Cancellation Workflow
architecture/sequence-diagrams/order-can.description: This diagram shows the order cancellation workflow implementing the Saga compensation pattern.

architecture/sequence-diagrams/order-ful.title: Order Fulfillment Workflow
architecture/sequence-diagrams/order-ful.description: This diagram shows the complete end-to-end order fulfillment saga, from order receipt to shipment confirmation using the WES (Warehouse Execution System) as the central execution engine.

architecture/sequence-diagrams/packing-w.title: Packing Workflow
architecture/sequence-diagrams/packing-w.description: This diagram shows the packing child workflow with 7 steps: task creation, material selection, packing, weighing, label generation, label application, and sealing.

architecture/sequence-diagrams/picking-w.title: Picking Workflow
architecture/sequence-diagrams/picking-w.description: This diagram shows the detailed picking child workflow, including task creation, worker assignment, and pick completion signaling.

architecture/sequence-diagrams/receiving.title: Receiving Workflow
architecture/sequence-diagrams/receiving.description: This document describes the inbound receiving flow for processing incoming shipments, from dock arrival through putaway to storage locations.

architecture/sequence-diagrams/reprocess.title: Reprocessing Workflow
architecture/sequence-diagrams/reprocess.description: This document describes the order reprocessing flow for handling failed workflow executions, including retry logic and dead letter queue management.

architecture/sequence-diagrams/shipping-.title: Shipping Workflow (SLAM Process)
architecture/sequence-diagrams/shipping-.description: This diagram shows the shipping child workflow implementing the SLAM process: Scan, Label, Apply, Manifest.

architecture/sequence-diagrams/unit-trac.title: Unit Tracking Flow
architecture/sequence-diagrams/unit-trac.description: This document describes the unit-level tracking throughout the warehouse fulfillment process, from receiving to shipping.

architecture/sequence-diagrams/walling-w.title: Walling Workflow
architecture/sequence-diagrams/walling-w.description: The Walling Workflow handles the put-wall sorting process where walliners (workers) sort picked items from totes into order-specific bins before packing.

architecture/sequence-diagrams/wes-execu.title: WES Execution Workflow
architecture/sequence-diagrams/wes-execu.description: The WES (Warehouse Execution System) Execution Workflow orchestrates order execution through configurable process paths. It is the central execution engine started by the Orchestrator after wave assignment.

architecture/system-diagrams/data-flow.title: Data Flow Diagrams
architecture/system-diagrams/data-flow.description: This document describes the data flows within the WMS Platform, including synchronous API calls and asynchronous event flows.

architecture/system-diagrams/deployment.title: Kubernetes Deployment
architecture/system-diagrams/deployment.description: This document describes the Kubernetes deployment architecture for the WMS Platform.

architecture/system-diagrams/infrastruct.title: Infrastructure Topology
architecture/system-diagrams/infrastruct.description: This document describes the infrastructure topology of the WMS Platform, including all components and their interactions.

domain-driven-design/aggregates/consolid.title: ConsolidationUnit Aggregate
domain-driven-design/aggregates/consolid.description: The ConsolidationUnit aggregate manages the process of combining picked items for multi-item orders.

domain-driven-design/aggregates/inbound-.title: InboundShipment Aggregate
domain-driven-design/aggregates/inbound-.description: The InboundShipment aggregate is the root of the Receiving bounded context, managing the lifecycle of inbound shipments from suppliers.

domain-driven-design/aggregates/inventor.title: InventoryItem Aggregate
domain-driven-design/aggregates/inventor.description: The InventoryItem aggregate manages stock levels, locations, and reservations.

domain-driven-design/aggregates/order.title: Order Aggregate
domain-driven-design/aggregates/order.description: The Order aggregate is the root of the Order bounded context, managing the lifecycle of customer orders.

domain-driven-design/aggregates/pack-tas.title: PackTask Aggregate
domain-driven-design/aggregates/pack-tas.description: The PackTask aggregate manages the packing process for orders.

domain-driven-design/aggregates/pick-rou.title: PickRoute Aggregate
domain-driven-design/aggregates/pick-rou.description: The PickRoute aggregate manages optimized picking paths through the warehouse.

domain-driven-design/aggregates/pick-tas.title: PickTask Aggregate
domain-driven-design/aggregates/pick-tas.description: The PickTask aggregate manages warehouse picking operations for orders.

domain-driven-design/aggregates/process-.title: ProcessPath Aggregate
domain-driven-design/aggregates/process-.description: The ProcessPath aggregate determines the optimal fulfillment process path for orders based on item characteristics and special handling requirements.

domain-driven-design/aggregates/putaway-.title: PutawayTask Aggregate
domain-driven-design/aggregates/putaway-.description: The PutawayTask aggregate is the root of the Stow bounded context, managing the lifecycle of putaway operations using various storage strategies.

domain-driven-design/aggregates/shipment.title: Shipment Aggregate
domain-driven-design/aggregates/shipment.description: The Shipment aggregate manages carrier integration and the SLAM (Scan, Label, Apply, Manifest) process.

domain-driven-design/aggregates/sortatio.title: SortationBatch Aggregate
domain-driven-design/aggregates/sortatio.description: The SortationBatch aggregate is the root of the Sortation bounded context, managing the grouping and sorting of packages by destination for efficient dispatch.

domain-driven-design/aggregates/station.title: Station Aggregate
domain-driven-design/aggregates/station.description: The Station aggregate is the root of the Facility bounded context, managing warehouse stations and their capabilities for process path routing.

domain-driven-design/aggregates/task-rou.title: TaskRoute Aggregate
domain-driven-design/aggregates/task-rou.description: The TaskRoute aggregate is the core domain model in the WES (Warehouse Execution System) bounded context. It tracks order execution through a sequence of stages.

domain-driven-design/aggregates/unit.title: Unit Aggregate
domain-driven-design/aggregates/unit.description: The Unit aggregate provides individual unit-level tracking throughout the warehouse fulfillment process, maintaining a complete audit trail of each physical unit's journey from receiving to shipping.

domain-driven-design/aggregates/walling-.title: WallingTask Aggregate
domain-driven-design/aggregates/walling-.description: The WallingTask aggregate is the core domain model in the Walling bounded context. It tracks the sorting of picked items from totes into order-specific bins on a put-wall.

domain-driven-design/aggregates/wave.title: Wave Aggregate
domain-driven-design/aggregates/wave.description: The Wave aggregate manages batches of orders released together for picking.

domain-driven-design/aggregates/worker.title: Worker Aggregate
domain-driven-design/aggregates/worker.description: The Worker aggregate manages warehouse workforce and task assignments.

domain-driven-design/bounded-contexts.title: Bounded Contexts
domain-driven-design/bounded-contexts.description: This document describes the bounded contexts within the WMS Platform and their responsibilities.

domain-driven-design/context-map.title: Context Map
domain-driven-design/context-map.description: This document shows the relationships between bounded contexts in the WMS Platform.

domain-driven-design/domain-events.title: Domain Events
domain-driven-design/domain-events.description: This document catalogs all domain events in the WMS Platform.

domain-driven-design/overview.title: Domain-Driven Design Overview
domain-driven-design/overview.description: The WMS Platform is built following Domain-Driven Design (DDD) principles, organizing the system into bounded contexts with rich domain models.

domain-driven-design/value-objects.title: Value Objects
domain-driven-design/value-objects.description: This document describes the value objects used across the WMS Platform.

infrastructure/kafka.title: Apache Kafka
infrastructure/kafka.description: Apache Kafka serves as the event streaming platform for the WMS Platform.

infrastructure/mongodb.title: MongoDB
infrastructure/mongodb.description: MongoDB is used as the primary database for all WMS Platform services.

infrastructure/observability.title: Observability
infrastructure/observability.description: The WMS Platform uses a comprehensive observability stack for monitoring, logging, and tracing.

infrastructure/overview.title: Infrastructure Overview
infrastructure/overview.description: This document provides an overview of the WMS Platform infrastructure components.

infrastructure/temporal.title: Temporal
infrastructure/temporal.description: Temporal is the workflow orchestration engine for the WMS Platform.

intro.title: WMS Platform
intro.description: Welcome to the Warehouse Management System (WMS) Platform documentation. This comprehensive guide covers the architecture, design decisions, and implementation details of a production-ready warehouse management system built with microservices.

services/billing-service.title: Billing Service
services/billing-service.description: The Billing Service manages invoicing, billable activities tracking, and fee calculations for the WMS Platform. It aggregates all billable events and generates invoices for sellers.

services/channel-service.title: Channel Service
services/channel-service.description: The Channel Service manages external sales channel integrations, enabling order import, inventory synchronization, and tracking updates with platforms like Shopify, Amazon, eBay, and WooCommerce.

services/consolidation-service.title: Consolidation Service
services/consolidation-service.description: The Consolidation Service combines picked items for multi-item orders.

services/facility-service.title: Facility Service
services/facility-service.description: The Facility Service manages warehouse stations, their capabilities, and process path routing.

services/inventory-service.title: Inventory Service
services/inventory-service.description: The Inventory Service manages stock levels and warehouse locations.

services/labor-service.title: Labor Service
services/labor-service.description: The Labor Service manages workforce and task assignments.

services/orchestrator.title: Orchestrator
services/orchestrator.description: The Orchestrator is a Temporal worker that executes workflow orchestration for order fulfillment using the WES (Warehouse Execution System) as the central execution engine.

services/order-service.title: Order Service
services/order-service.description: The Order Service manages the complete order lifecycle from receipt to completion, including error handling with retry logic and dead letter queue management.

services/packing-service.title: Packing Service
services/packing-service.description: The Packing Service handles package preparation and labeling.

services/picking-service.title: Picking Service
services/picking-service.description: The Picking Service manages warehouse picking operations.

services/process-path-service.title: Process Path Service
services/process-path-service.description: The Process Path Service determines the optimal fulfillment process path for orders based on item characteristics and special handling requirements.

services/receiving-service.title: Receiving Service
services/receiving-service.description: The Receiving Service manages inbound shipments and the receiving process for goods arriving at the warehouse.

services/routing-service.title: Routing Service
services/routing-service.description: The Routing Service calculates optimal pick paths through the warehouse.

services/seller-portal.title: Seller Portal
services/seller-portal.description: The Seller Portal is a Backend-for-Frontend (BFF) service that provides a unified API for seller dashboards, aggregating data from multiple WMS services to deliver order metrics, inventory status, billing information, and channel integrations.

services/seller-service.title: Seller Service
services/seller-service.description: The Seller Service manages merchant/seller accounts, their contracts, facility assignments, fee schedules, and external sales channel integrations for the WMS Platform.

services/shipping-service.title: Shipping Service
services/shipping-service.description: The Shipping Service handles carrier integration and the SLAM process.

services/sortation-service.title: Sortation Service
services/sortation-service.description: The Sortation Service manages package sortation, grouping packages by destination and carrier for efficient dispatch.

services/stow-service.title: Stow Service
services/stow-service.description: The Stow Service manages putaway tasks and storage location assignment using various storage strategies.

services/unit-service.title: Unit Service
services/unit-service.description: The Unit Service provides individual unit-level tracking throughout the warehouse fulfillment process, maintaining a complete audit trail of each physical unit's journey from receiving to shipping.

services/walling-service.title: Walling Service
services/walling-service.description: The Walling Service manages put-wall operations for sorting picked items into order-specific bins before packing. It is used in the pickwallpack process path for medium-sized orders.

services/waving-service.title: Waving Service
services/waving-service.description: The Waving Service groups orders into waves for efficient batch processing.

services/wes-service.title: WES Service
services/wes-service.description: The Warehouse Execution System (WES) Service orchestrates order execution through configurable process paths, managing the flow from picking through optional walling/consolidation to packing.

temporal/activities/consolidation-activi.title: Consolidation Activities
temporal/activities/consolidation-activi.description: Activities for managing item consolidation from multiple pick totes.

temporal/activities/giftwrap-activities.title: Gift Wrap Activities
temporal/activities/giftwrap-activities.description: Activities for managing gift wrap operations during order fulfillment.

temporal/activities/inventory-activities.title: Inventory Activities
temporal/activities/inventory-activities.description: Activities for managing inventory operations including reservations, allocations, and shipments.

temporal/activities/order-activities.title: Order Activities
temporal/activities/order-activities.description: Activities for managing order lifecycle and status transitions.

temporal/activities/overview.title: Activities Overview
temporal/activities/overview.description: Activities are the building blocks of Temporal workflows, executing the actual business logic.

temporal/activities/packing-activities.title: Packing Activities
temporal/activities/packing-activities.description: Activities for managing packing tasks, materials, and labels.

temporal/activities/picking-activities.title: Picking Activities
temporal/activities/picking-activities.description: Activities for managing picking tasks and worker assignments.

temporal/activities/process-path-activit.title: Process Path Activities
temporal/activities/process-path-activit.description: Activities for determining and persisting order process paths.

temporal/activities/receiving-activities.title: Receiving Activities
temporal/activities/receiving-activities.description: Activities for managing inbound shipment receiving and stow operations.

temporal/activities/reprocessing-activit.title: Reprocessing Activities
temporal/activities/reprocessing-activit.description: Activities for managing failed workflow reprocessing, retry logic, and dead letter queue operations.

temporal/activities/routing-activities.title: Routing Activities
temporal/activities/routing-activities.description: Activities for calculating optimal pick routes through the warehouse.

temporal/activities/shipping-activities.title: Shipping Activities
temporal/activities/shipping-activities.description: Activities for managing shipments, carrier manifests, and customer notifications.

temporal/activities/slam-activities.title: SLAM Activities
temporal/activities/slam-activities.description: Activities for the Scan, Label, Apply, Manifest (SLAM) process.

temporal/activities/sortation-activities.title: Sortation Activities
temporal/activities/sortation-activities.description: Activities for managing package sortation to carrier chutes.

temporal/activities/stow-activities.title: Stow Activities
temporal/activities/stow-activities.description: Activities for managing stow operations during inbound receiving and putaway.

temporal/activities/unit-activities.title: Unit Activities
temporal/activities/unit-activities.description: Activities for unit-level tracking throughout the fulfillment process.

temporal/diagrams/order-flow.title: Order Flow Diagram
temporal/diagrams/order-flow.description: Complete visualization of order processing through the WMS Platform.

temporal/diagrams/signal-flow.title: Signal Flow Diagrams
temporal/diagrams/signal-flow.description: Visual representation of signal timing and flow between workflows and external systems.

temporal/diagrams/workflow-hierarchy.title: Workflow Hierarchy
temporal/diagrams/workflow-hierarchy.description: Visual representation of parent-child workflow relationships in the WMS Platform.

temporal/overview.title: Temporal Workflow Architecture
temporal/overview.description: The WMS Platform uses Temporal as its workflow orchestration engine to coordinate complex, long-running business processes across distributed microservices.

temporal/retry-policies.title: Retry Policies
temporal/retry-policies.description: Reference for retry configuration and timeout settings in the WMS Platform.

temporal/signals-queries.title: Signals & Queries
temporal/signals-queries.description: Reference for all workflow signals and query handlers in the WMS Platform.

temporal/task-queues.title: Task Queues
temporal/task-queues.description: Reference for all Temporal task queues used in the WMS Platform.

temporal/workflows/cancellation.title: Cancellation Workflows
temporal/workflows/cancellation.description: Workflows for handling order cancellation with proper inventory compensation.

temporal/workflows/consolidation.title: ConsolidationWorkflow
temporal/workflows/consolidation.description: Coordinates the consolidation of multi-item orders from multiple pick routes or totes.

temporal/workflows/gift-wrap.title: GiftWrapWorkflow
temporal/workflows/gift-wrap.description: Coordinates gift wrap processing for orders that require special packaging and gift messaging.

temporal/workflows/inbound-fulfillment.title: InboundFulfillmentWorkflow
temporal/workflows/inbound-fulfillment.description: Orchestrates the inbound fulfillment process from ASN (Advanced Shipping Notice) through stow.

temporal/workflows/order-fulfillment.title: OrderFulfillmentWorkflow
temporal/workflows/order-fulfillment.description: The main saga workflow that orchestrates the entire order fulfillment process from validation through shipping.

temporal/workflows/packing.title: PackingWorkflow
temporal/workflows/packing.description: Coordinates the packing process for an order including material selection, labeling, and sealing.

temporal/workflows/picking.title: OrchestratedPickingWorkflow
temporal/workflows/picking.description: Coordinates the picking process for an order with enhanced features like unit-level tracking and inventory staging.

temporal/workflows/planning.title: PlanningWorkflow
temporal/workflows/planning.description: Determines the process path for an order and handles wave assignment with priority-based timeouts.

temporal/workflows/reprocessing.title: ReprocessingWorkflow
temporal/workflows/reprocessing.description: Scheduled workflow that automatically reprocesses failed order fulfillment workflows.

temporal/workflows/service-consolidation.title: Consolidation Service - ConsolidationWorkflow
temporal/workflows/service-consolidation.description: Service-level workflow that handles item consolidation with signal-based progress tracking.

temporal/workflows/service-packing.title: Packing Service - PackingWorkflow
temporal/workflows/service-packing.description: Service-level workflow that handles the packing process with signal-based progress tracking.

temporal/workflows/service-picking.title: Picking Service - PickingWorkflow
temporal/workflows/service-picking.description: Service-level workflow that handles the picking process with signal-based worker coordination.

temporal/workflows/service-shipping.title: Shipping Service - ShippingWorkflow
temporal/workflows/service-shipping.description: Service-level workflow that handles the SLAM (Scan, Label, Apply, Manifest) and shipping process.

temporal/workflows/service-wes.title: WES Service - WESExecutionWorkflow
temporal/workflows/service-wes.description: Main execution workflow that orchestrates order processing through stages via cross-queue child workflows.

temporal/workflows/shipping.title: ShippingWorkflow
temporal/workflows/shipping.description: Coordinates the SLAM (Scan, Label, Apply, Manifest) and shipping process for completed packages.

temporal/workflows/sortation.title: SortationWorkflow
temporal/workflows/sortation.description: Routes packages to destination chutes based on carrier and destination for final carrier pickup.

temporal/workflows/stock-shortage.title: StockShortageWorkflow
temporal/workflows/stock-shortage.description: Handles compensation for confirmed stock shortages during picking with automatic fulfillment strategy decisions.

temporal/workflows/wes-execution.title: WESExecutionWorkflow
temporal/workflows/wes-execution.description: The Warehouse Execution System workflow coordinates picking, walling (consolidation), and packing operations.
